feed.title: Pocket ID Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Pocket ID: v0.48.0
entry.content:
[!WARNING]
This release fixes a bug where the callback URL wasn't validated correctly. It's recommended to update to this version.

Features

  • add gif support for logo and background image (56a8b5d)
  • disable/enable users (#437 by @kmendell)

Bug Fixes

  • add "type" as reserved claim (0111a58)
  • callback URL doesn't get rejected if it starts with a different string (f0dce41)
  • profile picture empty for users without first or last name (#449 by @kmendell)
  • user querying fails on global audit log page with Postgres (84f1d5c)

entry.title: New release for Pocket ID:
entry.content:
Features

  • add ability to send login code via email (#457)
  • add description to callback URL inputs (eb689eb)
  • send email to user when api key expires within 7 days (#451)

Bug Fixes

  • disable animations not respected on authorize and logout page (e571996)
  • hide alternative sign in button if user is already authenticated (4e05b82)
  • locale change in dropdown doesn't work on first try (60bad9e)
  • remove limit of 20 callback URLs (c37a3e0)

entry.title: New release for Pocket ID: v0.50.0
entry.content:
Features

  • device authorization endpoint (#270)
  • make family name optional (#476)

Bug Fixes

  • incorrectly swapped refreshToken and accessToken (#490 by @j-baker)
  • do not override XDG_DATA_HOME/XDG_CONFIG_HOME if they are already set (#472 by @it)
  • pass context to methods that were missing it (#487 by @ItalyPaleAle)
  • prevent deadlock when trying to delete LDAP users (#471 by @ItalyPaleAle)
  • rootless Caddy data and configuration (#470 by @eiqnepm)

entry.title: New release for Pocket ID: v0.51.0
entry.content:
Features

  • new login code card position for mobile devices (#452 by @James18232)

Bug Fixes

  • do not require PKCE for public clients (ce24372)
  • hide global audit log switch for non admin users (1efd1d1)
  • return correct error message if user isn't authorized (86d2b5f)
  • updating scopes of an authorized client fails with Postgres (0a24ab8)

entry.title: New release for Pocket ID: v0.51.1
entry.content:
Bug Fixes

  • allow LDAP users to update their locale (0b9cbf4)
  • last name still showing as required on account form (#492)
  • non admin users weren't able to call the end session endpoint (6bd6cef)
